properties.name: pdffer.mailer.send-from.name
properties.description: The name or label associated to the sender's email address

properties.name: pdffer.web.controller.base-uri
properties.description: The base URI at which the web controller for the PDFfer endpoints will be registered

properties.name: pdffer.mailer.controller.base-uri
properties.description: The base URI at which the mailer controller for the PDFfer endpoints will be registered

properties.name: pdffer.mailer.reply-to.name
properties.description: The name or label associated to the email address to which replies should be sent

properties.name: pdffer.mailer.reply-to.address
properties.description: The email address to which replies should be sent

properties.name: pdffer.mailer.smtp.host
properties.description: The SMTP host to handle the sending of email messages

properties.name: pdffer.mailer.smtp.port
properties.description: The port of the SMTP host

properties.name: pdffer.mailer.smtp.username
properties.description: The username to authenticate to the SMTP host

properties.name: pdffer.mailer.smtp.password
properties.description: The password to be used with the SMTP host

properties.name: pdffer.mailer.smtp.java-mail-properties
properties.description: A free-format set of properties that will be passed to the SMTP connection

properties.name: pdffer.mailer.smtp.java-mail-properties
properties.description: A free-format set of properties that will be passed to the SMTP connection

properties.name: pdffer.mailer.controller.email-uri
properties.description: The URI of the email endpoint for the mailer controller

properties.name: pdffer.web.controller.download-uri
properties.description: The URI of the download endpoint for the web controller

properties.name: pdffer.web.controller.save-uri
properties.description: The URI of the save endpoint for the web controller

properties.name: pdffer.skip.web.controller
properties.description: Whether to disable the PDFfer web controller

properties.name: pdffer.skip.mailer.controller
properties.description: Whether to disable the PDFfer mailer controller

properties.name: pdffer.skip.mailer.beans
properties.description: Whether to disable the PDFfer mailer beans (also disables the mailer controllers)
